title: Mr. Happy [and friends]
brief_description: Seven fun-filled stories about Mr. Happy and six of his friends - Mr. Funny, the funniest man you will ever see; Mr. Lazy who lives in Sleepyland; Mr. Chatterbox who never gives you a moment of silence; Mr. Grumpy who is the grumpiest person you will ever meet; Mr. Worrier the biggest worrier in the world and Mr. Silly who wants to win the silliest idea of the year competition. Based on the popular “Mr. Men” picture books by Roger Hargreaves. Narrated by Arthur Lowe of “Dad’s Army” fame.
